title: AUPALLA Fitness Tracker, 21BP Smart band Activity Tracker Work With Heart Rate Monitor and Blood Pressure Measure Pedometer Sleep Monitor Calories Track Support iPhone Android Smartphone (Black)
feature: BLOOD PRESSURE MEASURE-Smart blood pressure monitor measure your Systolic,Diastolic blood pressure after sports or in daily life and show the history records on App.Only Monitor blood pressure automatically during sleep time(22PM-8AM next day)
HEART RATE MONITOR -Aupalla 21BP fitness tracker track heart rate 24/7 continuously on your wrist to maximise workouts. Automatically tracks steps, distance, calories and time.

CONNECTED GPS & WATERPROOF-Connect to your phone’s GPS to see a map of your route post-workout.AUPALLA 21BP fitness tracker is designed as splash-proof grade.You can wear it in the rain ,or when you are washing your hands. But ,no swim, no shower, no bathe and no surf.
AUTO SLEEP TRACKING- AUPALLA 21BP fitness tracker automatically tracks how long and how well you sleep to help you work toward a better routine.
CALL NOTIFICATION-Vibration alerts for call ID and text notifications,Facebook,twitter …notification, movement reminders, and alarms
description: Measure your Systolic,Diastolic blood pressure after sports or in daily life With a Continuous, automatic heart rate tracking right on your wrist. Get Reminders to Move that encourage you to reach an hourly goal. Connect AUPALLA 21BP with the GPS on your phone to see map of your route. See call, text and calendar alerts on display when your phone is nearby. Aupalla 21BP fitness tracker is compatible with Android devices equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 and running iOS 8.0 or later (iPhone 4 or newer) and Android 4.4 or later.Battery life up to 4 days so you can track all day and night without needing a charge. Take off the band,see a USB plugger.Plug and charge directly on computer or any charger with a USB port .AUPALLA 21BP fitness tracker is designed as splash-proof grade.You can wear it in the rain ,or when you are washing your hands. But ,no swim, no shower, no bathe and no surf. AUPALLA 21BP fitness tracker User Manual
